しびれが切れる: (しびれがきれる) - to go numb; to have pins and needles
しびれを切らす: (しびれをきらす) - to get tired of waiting; to grow impatient
しぶとい: (shibutoi) - tenaz, resistente, perseverante, obstinado, teimoso, cabeçudo, obstinado, inflexível
しぼり器: (しぼりき) - wringer (clothes); squeezer (fruit, etc.); press (grapes, etc.)
しぼり汁: (しぼりじる) - squeezed juice (e.g. of a lemon)
しぼり滓: (しぼりかす) - strained lees (e.g. sake, tofu); draff
しぼり立て: (しぼりたて) - freshly squeezed (juice); freshly milked
しぼり粕: (しぼりかす) - strained lees (e.g. sake, tofu); draff
しぼり込む: (しぼりこむ) - to squeeze/to wring out; to narrow down/to refine
しまい込む: (しまいこむ) - to put away; to stow away; to tuck away; to hoard
しまりが無い: (しまりがない) - not at all tense; relaxed; calm
しみったれる: (しみったれる) - to be stingy; to be tightfisted
しみ出す: (しみだす) - to ooze (out); to seep
しみ出る: (しみでる) - to ooze; to exude; to percolate; to soak through
しみ込む: (しみこむ) - to soak into; to permeate; to penetrate
しめしめ: (しめしめ) - (derived from 占める)  all right; so far so good; said quietly (or thought) to oneself when glad that things have gone as hoped
しめやか: (shimeyaka) - quieto e discreto na aparência, solene, triste e deprimido no comportamento, suave, gentil
しめる: (しめる) - (old causative verbal ending)  to make; to let
しめ縄: (shimenawa) - corda usada para delimitar áreas consagradas ou como talismã contra o mal
しめ飾り: (しめかざり) - decorating shrines and gates with shimenawa ropes for the New Year
しもた屋: (しもたや) - store that has been gone out of business; household that lives without carrying on a business
しもつかれ: (しもつかれ) - dish of simmered salmon head, soybeans, vegetables, and leftovers (popular in Tochigi Prefecture and surrounds)
しゃあない: (shaanai) - não tem jeito, é assim mesmo, c'est la vie
しゃかしゃか: (しゃかしゃか) - nylon track suit (when worn as street fashion); rattle-rattle/rustle-rustle/whisper-whisper/squiff-squiff
しゃがみ込む: (しゃがみこむ) - to squat; to crouch down (completely, generally with face looking through knees)
しゃがれ声: (しゃがれごえ) - hoarse voice; husky voice
しゃきっと: (shakitto) - crocante; refrescante, direto, firme, afiado, inteligente e elegante
しゃぎり: (しゃぎり) - short flute piece (in kyogen; usu. a lively solo); (also written as 砂切) flute and drum music played after each act but the last (in kabuki)
しゃくに障る: (しゃくにさわる) - to irritate; to grate on one's nerves; to aggravate; to be galling; to be invidious
しゃくの種: (しゃくのたね) - irritant; cause of irritation; cause of annoyance
しゃくり上げる: (しゃくりあげる) - to sob convulsively; to heave with sobs
しゃく熱: (しゃくねつ) - red hot; white hot; scorching heat; incandescence
しゃこめし: (シャコめし) - shako meshi; rice cooked with shrimp
しゃこ貝: (シャコガイ) - giant clam (any clam of subfamily Tridacnidae)
しゃしゃり出る: (しゃしゃりでる) - to come uninvited; to crash (a party); to butt in
しゃちほこ張る: (しゃちほこばる) - to stand on ceremony; to stiffen up (the nerves)/to be tense
しゃっきり: (shakkiri) - postura firme e reta, atitude firme, ativa
しゃっちょこ立ち: (しゃっちょこだち) - headstand; doing one's best/doing something to the best of one's ability
しゃなりしゃなり: (しゃなりしゃなり) - gracefully; affectedly; mincingly
しゃばい: (しゃばい) - (poss. from やばい) dangerous; (poss. from しょぼい) unsatisfactory/boring
しゃぶり付く: (しゃぶりつく) - to suck on; to cling to; to chew on
しゃべくり漫才: (しゃべくりまんざい) - manzai based on comic dialogue (as opposed to a skit)
しゃりしゃり: (シャリシャリ) - sound of two hard thin objects rubbing together; crunch crunch
しゃれっ気: (しゃれっけ) - fashion-consciousness/desire to be stylish; humor/humour/wit
しゃれ込む: (しゃれこむ) - to get dressed up; to treat oneself

しゃんと: (shanto) - estar em forma, manter uma aparência digna
しゃーない: (しゃーない) - it can't be helped; so it goes; c'est la vie
しやすい: (しやすい) - easy to make; easy to do
しゅるしゅる: (しゅるしゅる) - rustling (as of silk); slithering (sound); whizzing; hissing

しょうがないなぁ: (しょうがないなぁ) - if you insist (on it)
しょうがないなあ: (しょうがないなぁ) - if you insist (on it)
しょうが無い: (しょうがない) - it can't be helped; it is inevitable; nothing can be done; there's no point (in doing something); there's no reason (to do something)

しょうが酢: (しょうがず) - vinegar mixed with ginger juice and soy sauce, etc.
しょうちゅう漬け: (しょうちゅうづけ) - fruit, etc. preserved in shochu
しょうも無い: (しょうもない) - useless/stupid/good-for-nothing; having no way to do ...
しょうゆ炒め: (しょうゆいため) - fried dish seasoned with soy sauce

しょう油: (しょゆう) - (しょゆ, しょゆう are dial.) soy sauce; shoyu

しょびく: (しょびく) - to drag along; to take (a suspect to the police)/to drag (someone) away
しょぼくれる: (しょぼくれる) - to be dispirited; to be dejected; to be disheartened; to lose heart

しょぼつく: (しょぼつく) - to drizzle; to become bleary (eyes)
しょんぼり: (しょんぼり) - being downhearted; dejected; dispirited; despondent
